Gierki MaÅ‚Å¼eÅ„skie: Kalambury (Marriage Games: Charades) is a charades tournament for couples. In 2-4 pairs variant, couples compete with each other. There is also a one couple variant in which partners compete against each other.

There are four types of challenges (described on cards): draw, show, describe using only words starting with "p", draw something whose name begins with a given letter.

Gierki MaÅ‚Å¼eÅ„skie: Kalambury is one of the Gierki MaÅ‚Å¼eÅ„skie ("Marriage Games") series. It is a stand-alone game, but the cards can also be used in the base Gierki MaÅ‚Å¼eÅ„skie game.

—user summary

Name: Kod Krakowa
Description:
Kod Krakowa ("The Code of Krakow") is an educational game for young people created under the patronage of the City of Krakow. During the game, players move around the board made up of tiles (districts of Krakow). The game starts with six tiles - the oldest districts - and as it progresses, more districts are added. In each district there are some important places identified (divided into categories, e.g. Art or Spiritual Life) represented by tokens. The winner is the player who first collects a certain number of tokens of a certain type.

An online knowledge platform is integrated into the game. On each of the elements (board tiles, tokens) there are QR codes, which link to pages with descriptions of districts and places in the game. The platform was prepared under the supervision of the Jagiellonian University staff. In the game there are also cards with important events from the history of the city, which introduce minor modifications to the game (e.g. give extra traffic to the player).

The game is not available for sale. It was distributed for free at promotional events and is available in city libraries.

Name: XXXopoly Pride
Description:
XXXopoly Pride is an erotic game to be enjoyed by gay and lesbian intimate couples or groups. Explore each other in ways that you have never dreampt possible.  XXXopoly Pride will bring everyone closer together, both literally and figuratively.

The board is divided into four sections. You keep moving around the board trying to purchase as many Sexual Spaces as you can. If you land on a Sexual Space that is owned by someone else you must perform what is on the space. Each space constitutes a sexual action ranging from a kiss all the way up to having intercourse for short periods of time. There are many other erotic activities such as massaging, licking, sucking, and more! Bankrupt your partners to win.

XXXopoly Pride is more special because there are two games in one! It all depends on what you like and which side you prefer! On the blue side, experience the hottest, most erotic gay game ever made. Flip it over and experience the hottest, most sensuous, lesbian game every created. XXXopoly pride has it all!

—description from the game box

Name: Ice Cream Empire
Description:
Each player begins with $300, a delivery truck to be used as a pawn, and eight cones which match the color of the delivery truck chosen. The truck begins the game on the corner of the matching color of the game board.

In turn, a player rolls the six-sided die and moves the delivery truck around the game board clockwise. After following the instructions on the space, a player has five options:
1. Buy ice cream from the bank at the prices printed on the current Inventory Price Card.
2. Sell ice cream back to the bank $100 plus the bonus earned for having chains of shops on the game board.
3. Build one store for $400.
4. Pay a competitor to force a sale of a store from that competitor of $600.
5. Pass.
Play continues until one player can be declared the winner by having eight stores and $3000 in cash.

Name: Red Fleet at Dawn: Cold War Combat in the North Atlantic
Description:
These are my 1980's fast play modern naval combat rules.  Whilst the mechanisms are very different to my other rules sets the idea of making them as fast and fun as possible remain the same, even though missile armed warships are by their nature immensely complicated

I am making this set of rules FREE. 2 reasons for this.


     1st I am using them as an introduction to my other rules sets which are all a lot of fun to play and very cheap to buy!  So download for nothing and if they peak your interest check out my other rules sets  put "Dawn Gaming" in the search bar and see what you like, many of them have a free sampler and I cover a number of interesting periods in history.


I am not going to go into great detail about these rules.... they are free!  Just download the whole set.


     And the 2nd reason is that they are not exhaustive, I have put stats in for a number of Soviet and US ships subs and aircraft but this is certainly not an exhaustive set of data.  


If people like the game I may do additional data sets (for free) but you can probably knock your own up anyway.

—description from the designer / publisher

Name: Starcadia Quest: Yuri & Cury
Description: Contains hero cards and miniatures for Yuri and Cury.
